WorkItem.ClosedComment: The option for "Start the task only if ... AC power" is TaskDefinition.Settings.DisallowStartIfOnBatteries and for "Stop if the computer switches to battery power" is TaskDefinition.Settings.StopIfGoingOnBatteries.
